name: Fjallraven High Coast Tote Pack - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description:
Carry it by hand, over the shoulder or on your back. This multi-functional bag has room for your everyday kit at home or afar. The fabric is coated for weather-resistance so your belongings are protected from splashes or light rain.210-denier recycled nylon fabric has a water-resistant coating.Waterproof base is reinforced for extra durability.Padded shoulder straps can be secured close to the back panel.Webbing handles and detachable over-the-shoulder strap.Interior zippered pockets and outer side pockets.1 zippered external pocket doubles as a stuff sack.

        Sustainability
